Key Match Events: Kai Havertz scored a penalty in the 53rd minute.
Jamal Musiala scored in the 68th minute.
Germany's round-of-16 clash was delayed by a thunderstorm.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany survived a scare from Denmark to ease into the quarterfinals with a 2-0 win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at SIGNAL IDUNA PARK in Dortmund, Germany.
The match was officiated by referee Michael Oliver.
